TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IdentityConfiguration extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the collection of configurable properties controlling the behavior of the Windows Identity Foundation.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. Settings are loaded from the default configuration, if it exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Property values are loaded from the unnamed `<identityConfiguration>` element in the configuration file, if such an element exists; otherwise, properties are set to their default values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool loadConfig) cil managed

Docs.param: to load settings from the configuration file; otherwise .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class by using a value that specifies whether settings should be loaded from the default configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If `loadConfig` is `true`, property values are loaded from the unnamed `<identityConfiguration>` element in the configuration file; otherwise properties are set to their default values.

Docs.exception: is , but there is no configuration element.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed
abstract member Initialize : unit -> unit override this.Initialize : unit -> unit

Docs.summary: Updates properties in the objects for the objects contained in the to be consistent with the property values on this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method should be invoked prior to using the token handlers to process tokens. The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager%2A> property specifies the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager> that contains the security token handlers configured for this instance.

Docs.exception: This method is invoked more than once.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void LoadConfiguration(class System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfigurationElement element) cil managed

Docs.summary: Loads the settings for this instance from the application or Web configuration file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks If there is no configuration file, if the named section does not exist, or if `element` is `null`, then no exception is thrown; instead the instance is loaded with a set of default values. This method calls the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Configuration.IdentityConfiguration.LoadHandlers%2A> method to load the token handler configuration.

Docs.summary: Loads a from a configuration file.
